name: lta_diff
description: A tool to compute different distance norms for a single transform or for the difference between two transforms.

inputs.description: Distance type: 1 (Rigid Trans. Dist.), 2 (Affine Transform Distance), 3 (8-corners mean distance), 4 (Max Displacement), 5 (Determinant scaling), 6 (Interpolation Smoothing), 7 (Decomposition). Default is 2.
inputs.name: Distance Type

inputs.description: Invert first transform before computing difference matrix D
inputs.name: Invert First Transform

inputs.description: Invert second transform before computing difference matrix D
inputs.name: Invert Second Transform

inputs.description: Compute distance in vox coordinates, after adjusting for voxel sizes. Default is RAS coordinates.
inputs.name: Vox Coordinates

inputs.description: Divide final distance by this value for step adjustment.
inputs.name: Normalization Divisor

inputs.description: Radius in mm, used for RMS distance. Default is 100 to include the head.
inputs.name: Radius

author: FreeSurfer Developers
